1.title: Geddy Lee
1.plot: Ed, Don and Jim welcome back Geddy Lee to celebrate 40 years of Rush. Dream Theater's John Petrucci shreds on guitar.

2.title: Anthrax
2.plot: Anthrax take over TMS as Charlie, Frank and Scott catch up with the boys and talk new music. Joey Belladonna dials in on the Metal Modem. Alex Skolnick tears it up on guitar as guest musician.

3.title: Dave Lombardo/John 5
3.plot: Drummer king Dave Lombardo sits down with Ed, Don & Jim to discuss his new projects and clears the air on Slayer. John 5 pulls double duty as a guest on set and shredder on the musician stand. Motörhead dials the Metal Modem.

4.title: Marky Ramone/Darryl McDaniels/Gary Holt
4.plot: Ed, Don & Jim meet with Marky Ramone, Darryl McDaniels, and Gary Holt.

5.title: Jamey Jasta/Armored Saint
5.plot: Ed, Don & Jim meet with Jamey Jasta, lead vocalist in Hatebreed and sludge metal band Kingdom of Sorrow. Later joins Joey Vera and John Bush of metal band, Armored Saint.

6.title: Mark Tremonti/The Pretty Reckless
6.plot: Ed, Don & Jim meet with New York American rock band, The Pretty Reckless.

7.title: Chris Jericho/Max Cavalera/Billy Corgan
7.plot: Fozzy's Chris Jericho, Soulfly's Max Cavalera and Smashing Pumpkins frontman Billy Corgan pack the house for another rowdy super-guest episode. "The Duke" Rich Ward tears up the second stage as guest musician.

8.title: Slayer/Lzzy Hale
8.plot: Slayer's Kerry King returns to the show and Halestorm's Lzzy Hale makes her TMS debut. Zakk Wylde takes the second stage for the first time as guest musician for a special closing performance you won't want to miss.

9.title: Kirk Hammett/Michael Schenker
9.plot: Metallica guitarist Kirk Hammett joins the boys for the hour to kick back and jam with his guitar idol Michael Schenker. You won't want to miss this special performance. Damon Johnson shreds as guest musician.

10.title: Ace Frehley/Mark Farner
10.plot: Ace "The Spaceman" Frehley returns to TMS as a Hall of Famer to talk Kiss, the induction and the future. Grand Funk Railroad's Mark Farner joins to discuss his storied career. Nita Strauss shreds as guest guitarist.

11.title: Taime Downe/Mark Slaughter/Andy Biersack
11.plot: Mark Slaughter, Faster Pussycat's Taime Downe, and Black Veil Brides' Andy Biersack join the boys for a rock n' roll power hour. Judas Priest founding member K.K. Downing dials up the Metal Modem. Guest musician Mike Orlando.

12.title: Joe Elliot/Bobby 'Blitz' Elsworth/Franki Banali
12.plot: Overkill's Bobby Blitz and Quiet Riot's Frankie Banali close out the fourteenth season of That Metal Show. Ed, Don and Jim catch up with Def Leppard's Joe Elliott behind the scenes. Billy Sheehan brings it on bass.

imdb.title: That Metal Show
plot: This show is about all things hard rock and heavy metal !::rkopinski
